sentences.sContent: Dallas:Something has attached itself to him. We have to get him to the infirmary right away.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dallas:Something has attached itself to him. We have to get him to the infirmary right away.
sentences.sCn: 达拉斯：有东西寄生在他体内。我们必须马上把他送进医务室。

remMethod.val: in(不) + firm(结实的) + ary → 柔弱的人常去的地方 → 医院

trans.tranOther: a hospital – often used in the names of hospitals in Britain
